content.text: Hey, how's your day going?
Hey! It's going well so far.  How about yours?
It's going well too. I'm at work right now. I work in a used book store.
Used book stores are the best! Do you have a favorite book?
Yes! I love the Harry Potter series. They're my favorite books of all time.
Me too! I love Harry Potter. Have you read the books or seen the movies?
I've read all of the books and seen all of the movies. I'm a huge fan.
Me too! I'm so excited for the new movie coming out this year.
Me too! I'm really hoping it's good.
I'm sure it will be great.  I love how they're bringing the books to life.
Me too. I think they're doing a great job so far.
What do you do for fun besides reading?
I like to play video games, watch movies, and hang out with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to do all of those things too.
Yeah, they're all great ways to relax and have fun.
I agree.  What's your favorite video game?
My favorite video game is The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.
That's a great game! I've heard a lot of good things about it.
It's really fun. It's a huge open world game where you can explore and do whatever you want.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I might have to check it out.
You should! It's a great game.
Thanks for the recommendation
